name: Nick
Reviews: Great product. Very satisfied with the quality. gave 2 things for free also as a courtesy .

name: Irtalo
Reviews: Prompt delivery but one of the set is defective.

name: Chole
Reviews: Pretty fast delivery. 100% original unit received. Device build quality and in hand feel is great.

name: Justin
Reviews: Could improve your packaging with bubble wraps, especially for sensitive items like phones. Seems intact, yet to be opened

name: Simon Robben
Reviews: Delivery timeline is impressive. Got it before the delivery schedule.

name: Stefen
Reviews: Price was lower compared to market price. Packaging was good too.
